Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: Merchant Park has development plots remaining extending to 35 acres (14 hectares) with outline planning permission already in place to provide up to 900,000 sq ft (83,600 sq m) of new buildings. Merchant Place Developments has an excellent track record for delivery of industrial and commercial property for occupiers in the North East and throughout the UK. Sustainable design and build solutions to meet occupier requirements for industrial, warehouse, office and other uses can be provided cost effectively and quickly.
